thread.title: Boost for ECB hawks as euro zone inflation rises

title: Boost for ECB hawks as euro zone inflation rises
text:
Boost for ECB hawks as euro zone inflation rises 2:25pm BST - 01:34 
Euro zone inflation increased in line with expectations in March mainly due to more costly food and services, data showed on Wednesday, providing modest support to European Central Bank policymakers pushing to wind down its stimulus. Ciara Lee   
Euro zone inflation increased in line with expectations in March mainly due to more costly food and services, data showed on Wednesday, providing modest support to European Central Bank policymakers pushing to wind down its stimulus. Ciara Lee  //reut.rs/2q589X3
